item.title: Lobsters Top Stories: Tuesday, October 15, 2024 at 9:15 AM UTC
item.description:
1. The Stallman Report (117 points | 113 comments)
2. Boring Tech Is Stifling Improvement (32 points | 44 comments)
3. a protocol for reliable notifications over a 1 bit fallible connection (14 points | 5 comments)
4. Why make software? (15 points | 4 comments)
5. New passkey specifications will let users import and export them (10 points | 11 comments)
6. Moving to LLVM IR (18 points | 4 comments)
7. OpenD on iPhone/Mac/etc.: ldc gets extern(Objective-C), dmd gets pragma(linkerDirective) and @section (16 points | 1 comment)
8. Large language models reduce public knowledge sharing on online Q&A platforms (32 points | 13 comments)
9. Antithesis: Pioneering Deterministic Hypervisors with FreeBSD and Bhyve (11 points | 2 comments)
10. Graphics Tricks from Boomers (7 points | no comments)
11. Use an External GPU on Raspberry Pi 5 for 4K Gaming (9 points | no comments)
12. Run Linux Containers on FreeBSD 14 with Podman (10 points | 1 comment)
13. vortex: A toolkit for working with compressed Arrow in-memory, on-disk, and over-the-wire. "The LLVM of file formats" (16 points | no comments)
14. The `Overwrite` trait and `Pin` (11 points | 1 comment)
15. RAGs to RIChes (1 points | no comments)
16. Ward Christensen, BBS inventor and architect of our online age, dies at age 78 (11 points | 1 comment)
17. Minetest Rebranding to Luanti (25 points | 6 comments)
18. What are you doing this week? (21 points | 33 comments)
19. Trust Rules Everything Around Me (WordPress, Code Security, etc.) (21 points | no comments)
20. Bill Gross wants to save media ... with AI (1 points | 1 comment)
21. fjall: LSM-based embeddable key-value storage engine written in safe Rust (9 points | 2 comments)
22. Text-overflow: Ellipsis Considered Harmful (2022) (10 points | 2 comments)
23. Ubuntu Will Include The Latest Linux Kernel Version in Future Releases (22 points | 33 comments)
24. FFmpeg Explorer (2023) (16 points | 1 comment)
25. Deriving the Kelly Criterion to maximise Profits (9 points | no comments)
